title: Total lobbying spending U.S. 1998 to 2019
summary: Overall Spending in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Spending in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2001 to 2008, and finally roughly constant from 2008 to 2010.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
Maximum Spending in billion U.S. dollars, about 3.51 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Spending in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1.63 was reported at Year 2001
